dn8:22.8_1: visārado ca nadatī’ti evamassu, kassapa, vacanīyā.
dn8:22.10_0: ‘sīhanādañca samaṇo gotamo nadati, parisāsu ca nadati, visārado ca nadati,
dn8:22.10_1: no ca kho naṁ pañhaṁ pucchanti …pe…
dn8:22.11_1: no ca kho nesaṁ pañhaṁ puṭṭho byākaroti …pe…
dn8:22.12_1: no ca kho pañhassa veyyākaraṇena cittaṁ ārādheti …pe…
dn8:22.19_0: ‘Sīhanādañca samaṇo gotamo nadati, parisāsu ca nadati, visārado ca nadati, pañhañca naṁ pucchanti,
dn8:22.19_2: pañhassa ca veyyākaraṇena cittaṁ ārādheti, sotabbañcassa maññanti, sutvā cassa pasīdanti, pasannākārañca karonti, tathattāya ca paṭipajjanti,
dn8:22.19_3: paṭipannā ca ārādhentī’ti evamassu, kassapa, vacanīyā.
dn8:23.2_0: Tatra maṁ aññataro tapabrahmacārī nigrodho nāma adhijegucche pañhaṁ apucchi.
dn8:23.4_0: Byākate ca pana me attamano ahosi paraṁ viya mattāyā”ti.
dn8:23.5_1: bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā na attamano assa paraṁ viya mattāya?
dn8:23.6_1: bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā attamano paraṁ viya mattāya.
dn8:23.8_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya,
dn8:23.10_0: Labheyyāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadan”ti.
dn8:24.1_1: aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṁ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṁ, so cattāro māse parivasati,
dn8:24.1_2: catunnaṁ māsānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti, upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya.
dn8:24.3_1: aññatitthiyapubbā imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhanti pabbajjaṁ, ākaṅkhanti upasampadaṁ, cattāro māse parivasanti,
dn8:24.3_2: catunnaṁ māsānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti, upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya.
dn8:24.3_4: catunnaṁ vassānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājentu,
dn8:24.4_0: Alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, alattha upasampadaṁ.
dn8:24.5_0: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā kassapo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti,
dn8:24.5_1: tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
dn8:24.7_0: Aññataro kho panāyasmā kassapo arahataṁ ahosīti.
